column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Last week my boss told me that I needed to go to a meeting in New York .
#id=2
#text=I decided the best way to get to New York was to take a train .
#id=3
#text=I went online and bought a train ticket that would get me there well ahead of the meeting start time .
#id=4
#text=On the day of the trip I went to the train station and stood in line at the ticket counter .
#id=5
#text=When I got to the front of the line I told the agent my name and they pulled up my reservation on their computer and printed out a paper ticket .
#id=6
#text=I thanked them , took the ticket , and left the counter .
#id=7
#text=Once I left the counter I went to the gate to wait for my train to come .
#id=8
#text=When my train arrived , everyone waiting for that train lined up and walked through the gate while the attendant checked our tickets .
#id=9
#text=Once I walked through the gate , I went outside and boarded the train .
#text=Thankfully I was able to sit alone , and I pulled out a magazine to read .
#text=A little while after the train started moving the conductor walked through the train car to check everyone 's ticket .
#text=I handed my ticket to the conductor and he scanned it and handed it back to me .
#text=Now I could enjoy my train ride and get back to reading my magazine .
#text=A little while later the conductor announced that the train had arrived in New York .
#text=The train came to a stop , and I got off of the train along with everyone else .
#text=I was pleased that I had a pleasant train ride , and I walked quickly through the train station to go outside and catch a cab to get to my meeting .
